label: clinical_signal_03_ep_020
content:

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: AE-0075, Description: diarrhea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Subject Group: statin
- AE ID: AE-0076, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Subject Group: statin
- AE ID: AE-0077, Description: jaundice, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: false, Subject Group: statin
- AE ID: AE-0078, Description: hepatic enzyme measurement out of range, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: false, Subject Group: statin
- AE ID: AE-0079, Description: Hy's Law case: ALT 3.8x ULN, total bilirubin 2.3x ULN, Grade: 3, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: false, Subject Group: statin

### Concomitant Meds
- Statin Count: 55

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PD-042, Description: Blood draw outside protocol-specified fasting window, Severity: minor, Site: site_07
- PD ID: PD-043, Description: Dose modification without documented PI approval, Severity: moderate, Site: site_06

### Investigator Notes
- Central lab results received within 48h turnaround
- Lab kits inventory adequate for next 4 weeks
- SAE report filed: subject 03-042, statin subgroup, ALT 3.8x ULN with bilirubin 2.3x ULN
- Pharmacology consult requested: CYP3A4 inhibition profile of LNS-4821 under review

### Events
- Site 07 monitoring visit completed, 3 findings
- Bioanalytical lab shipment tracking confirmed for 1 samples
- Central lab courier pickup schedule adjusted for holiday
- SAE report submitted to sponsor safety group and regulatory authority

### Notes
- Week 20: Cross-site statin subgroup hepatic signal confirmed. DDI pharmacology review in progress.
